column2:
"You come at a good time.
Sorry to trouble you, but would you be able to help me.
The ones jumping back are so noisy, I can't stand it. "

"I'm grateful for your assistance.
I will thank you, one day. "
"Shit……I wouldn't have thought I'd be showing such an unsightly side of myself……."
"Perhaps it was myself that was careless……"
"I have indeed been careless, however any disorder to her is unforgivable. Brace yourself……!"

"/ci1 5 ちょうどいいところに来てくれたな。
すまないが、手伝ってもらえるか。
はねっかえりがうるさくてたまらん。"

"/ci1 5 協力、感謝する。
この礼はまた、いずれ。"

"くそ……こんな無様な姿を
さらすことになるとは……"
"油断が過ぎたのは、俺自身か……"

"/ci3 2 /toge /mn3 油断があったのは事実だが
彼女への狼藉は、許されない。
覚悟しろ……！"
